question: When was the first battle of Panipat fought ?
explanation: In 1526 AD, the first battle of Panipat was fought between Babur and Sultan Ibrahim Lodi of Delhi at Panipat. Due to supremacy in the art of fighting, the organization of force and the deadly use of cannons, Babur won the battle over Ibrahim Lodi. In this battle, Sultan Ibrahim Lodi was killed and Delhi and Agra passed on to the hands of Babur who laid the foundation of Mughal rule in India.
